author: andschwa
body: To begin #1005, this updates the xUnit runner and makes `Start-PSxUnit` run the tests verbosely and not in parallel, which is necessary to see which test fails (and then causes the runner to abort). The failing tests are still failing, and out of scope of this PR. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1017)
title: Update xUnit runner
